summary: This document is a disclosure of testimony record for Lisa M. Rocchio Ph.D., listing her deposition and trial testimony in various court cases between 2002 and 2020. It appears to be a summary of her prior testimony history, potentially for qualification or disclosure purposes in a legal proceeding.

keyFacts: Lisa M. Rocchio Ph.D. has provided expert testimony in multiple court cases spanning from 2002 to 2020.
Her testimony includes both deposition and trial appearances in criminal and civil cases across several states.
The document serves as a disclosure of her prior testimony history, dated February 1, 2021.
None of the listed cases appear to be directly related to Jeffrey Epstein based on the information provided.
The document is part of a larger collection (EFTA00156671) and appears on page 1 of 1 of a specific record.
